segments.text: Do you have any work experience in this field ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . After my graduation from university , I worked as a Customer Service Coordinator in a foreign representative office , and then I transferred to a joint venture as a Market Development Manager . So I am familiar with the market in China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What have you learned from the jobs you have had ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I learned to be patient when dealing with customers complaints and try my best to solve them . In addition , I learned at my previous jobs how to cooperate with my colleagues .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does your current employer know you are looking for another job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven't discussed my leaving plans with my current employer , but I am sure he will release me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is your impression of your present company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would your current colleague say about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They would say I'm a dependable and hard worker .
segments.speaker: S2
